layout-full-width.name: Full Width
layout-full-width.description: No side columns, ideal for distraction-free pages such as product pages.

layout-both-columns.description: One large central column and 2 side columns.

layout-left-side-column.description: Two columns with a small left column

layout-right-side-column.description: Two columns with a small right column
